GSD.product_version: versions from v5.18 to before v6.0.3
GSD.description:
wifi: wfx: prevent underflow in wfx_send_pds()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 6ff14d84f3d854f03f88db625e9983d71cf87634, it was introduced in version v5.18 by commit dcbecb497908a127dd9fd361d8cdc68f46d8cff6. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: wifi: wfx: prevent underflow in wfx_send_pds()
